org.ngi.quadtree

Class QuadTreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ngi.quadtree.QuadTreeNode

  • public class QuadTreeNode
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a node for the spatial index. It holds the four quadrant child nodes or a list of Nodes at the leaf level.

      • getBounds

        public Bounds getBounds()

      • indexNode

        public void indexNode(Node n,
                      QuadTreeNodeCollection qtnc)
        Index a Node. This traverses the quadrants down to the leaf node and records the node. The Node is indexed based on the quadrants it intersects or is contained by..
        Parameters:
        n - Node to index.
        qtnc - Index collection associated with this node. This is passed down from the top level.

      • removeNode

        public void removeNode(Node n)
        Remove a Node from the QuadTree index.
        Parameters:
        n - Node to remove from the index.

      • mouseFocusTest

        public MouseFocus mouseFocusTest(float x,
                                 float y)
        Check for Mouse focus.
        Parameters:
        x - X value of point to check.
        y - Y value of point to check.
        Returns:
        The mouse focus object with the aquired node if found.
